Heatmap: A visual representation of data in the form of a map or diagram in which data values are represented as colors.
Screenshot: An image of the data displayed on the screen of a computer or mobile device.
Sketch: A rough or unfinished drawing or painting
Diagram: A simplified drawing showing the appearance, structure, or workings of something; a schematic representation.
Chart: A graphical representation of data designed to make it easier to understand trends, patterns, and relationships within a dataset.
